name: Climate Change Project
description:
Semi-epic climate change game made by a semi-epic bunch of kids.

It's a game meant for primary school students, but it's been made harder for secondary school students.

Credits:
Aidan Ball - Lead graphic artist and co-conceptual designer
Kyle Premadasa - Co-writer and co-conceptual designer
Rayen Lee - Lead scripter, composer, and functionality conceptual designer
